metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16747 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In MatrixSSL before 4.2.2 Open, the DTLS server can encounter an invalid pointer free (leading to memory corruption and a daemon crash) via a crafted incoming network message, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-14431.

criterions.comment: matrixssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
